message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering I'm taking the risk of proposing first. Let's see what you think.
I'm willing to give you a slightly higher share, but I still think I deserve more. Your turn!
Let's compromise. I'll take a smaller share than my previous offer, but I still need a bit more than your last proposal. What do you say?
